nodes.bodyText:
asserting same thing twice?
can we rename lstTypeInfo to listTypeInfo. Adding an "i" makes it clearer.

Can you add an assertion message to explain why an admin user can update, but not read? That of course is surprising behavior - normally a user can read but not update (or can do both). According to the JIRA ticket, it's to allow an admin to write artifacts during deployment - I think it's important that an assertion message captures that.
